resources.string:
C o l i b r i © 2014–2020

 Created and maintained by Louis DURAND
louis.dur54@gmail.com

\u0009 This application was originally launched during a development project in the engineering school Telecom Bretagne (now IMT Atlantique). Since then, it became an important project of mine that I slowly developed for about 6 years in my free time. Your feedback and comments are welcome on the Play Store or by email!\n\n\tI hope you will enjoy the game!

\u0009 You are a hummingbird in a field of menhirs in Brittany and you must gather all the flowers covering the meadow.\n\n\u0009 By swiping your finger in the desired direction, you can fly straight to the next obstacle (menhir, cow or edge). Once stopped, you will be able to fly in another direction.
\u0009 Along your progression in the Campaign, you will unlock and discover the different elements of the game like the magical flowers, the dynamites, the cows, the cats and the rainbows!

Start with some Campaign levels, then you could try the Multiplayer Challenges to confront your friends or other players from around the world!

 				 The Multiplayer mode:

 	 It is an online competitive mode! For each challenge played, depending on your position in the ranking, you earn (or loose!) a score roughly equivalent to the "number of defeated players" minus the "number of players who defeated you". In addition, this value is modulated by the general score of the participants in order to valorize weaker participants or newcomers.

 	 The "Score" should therefore be distinguished from the "Experience", which is only cumulative and represents the levels you have solved since you play Colibri! The "Rankings" page enables you to compare your stats with other participants.

 Have fun!!
\u0009 The length and the number of additional elements increases the difficulty but also the amount of experience earned!

Ouch!|Out of RAM… There might be no solution!
\u0009 The « ColiBrains » provide in-game hints by suggesting you the next steps, or by indicating you if you are blocked.
\u0009 The ColiBrains are accessible during the game using the side menu. The menu opens with a simple clic on the screen.
\u21AA For Random Maps or levels you already solved, ColiBrains are unlimited and you can use them freely to exercise.
\u21AA For Multiplayer Challenges or for unsolved Campaign levels, ColiBrains are limited ! The number of remaining ColiBrains is indicated over the icon.
\u0009 You must simply solve levels to earn new ColiBrains progressively! However, you won\'t be able to accumulate more than 6 ColiBrains.

\u0009 For example, it is always helpful to use a ColiBrain when you feel blocked before restarting a level since it might reveal a solution that you didn\'t see! In Multiplayer mode, ColiBrains can also give an advantage during an important match.
\u21AA Finally, the « ColiBrain » algorithm is also accessible at the end of each levels to let you visualize the fastest solution found by the algorithm!
\u2605 Congratulations!! \u2605\n You just unlocked a new game element:
When someone launched a new game with you.
When the results of a challenge are available.
General information sent by the game: it could be news or events.
